original_text: Someone who is sitting in your meeting may receive a special message from God. Then, the person who is already speaking should stop. Someone who is sitting in your meeting may receive a special message from God. Then, the person who is already speaking should stop.
korean_text: 만일 곁에 앉아 있는 다른 이에게 계시가 있으면 먼저 하던 자는 잠잠할지니라

sentences.original_text: Someone who is sitting in your meeting
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 모임에 앉아 있는 어떤 사람은

sentences.original_text: may receive a special message from God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님으로부터 특별한 메시지를 받을 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: Then, the person who is already speaking
